sense.def:
A sink
je pritrjena posoda s pipami, po katerih priteka voda, navadno v kuhinji ali kopalnici.

Kadar nekaj
sinks
, se počasi pomika navzdol, zlasti pod vodno gladino.

seg.quote: The boat sank to the bottom of the lake.
The sun had just sunk below the horizon.

sense.def:
To sink a ship
pomeni napasti ladjo in povzročiti, da potone.

To sink back
ali
to sink down
pomeni premakniti se v nižji položaj.

seg.quote: She sank back in her chair and sipped her drink.

sense.def:
Kadar količina ali vrednost
sinks
, se močno zmanjša.

seg.quote: Wages have sunk so low in relation to the cost of living.

sense.def:
To sink into an unpleasant or less active state
pomeni postopoma preiti v manj prijetno ali manj dejavno stanje.

seg.quote: My father sank further into debt.
I sank into a deep sleep.

sense.def:
Kadar srce nekega človeka
sinks
, ta postane potrt ali brez volje.

seg.quote: His heart sank at the thought that the exams were a week away.

sense.def:
To sink something sharp into something solid
pomeni, da nekaj ostrega potisnemo globoko v nekaj trdega.

seg.quote: He sank his teeth into the apple.

sense.def:
Kadar trditev ali dejstvo
sinks in
, ga nekdo popolnoma razume in dojame.

seg.quote: It took a moment or two for her words to sink in.
